DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare reaction time ( measure brake reaction time second simulate drive ) glare no-glare condition subject implant ACRYSOF® IQ intraocular lens ( IOLs ) subject implanted clear IOLs . This study enroll subject previously implant IOLs eye least 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Vision With ACRYSOF® IQ IOLs Blue Light Filtration
DOC.criteria: Pseudophakes ACRYSOF® IQ monofocal IOLs clear ( blue light filter ) IOLs eye least 3 month . Willing able understand sign inform consent form . Corrected visual acuity ( CVA ) 20/40 good . Have valid driver 's license . Depth perception least 100 arc second . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Ocular pathology , degeneration , medium opacity . Color vision defect . Use ocular systemic medication impact macular pigment density reaction time , include limited , lutein , zeaxanthin , barbiturate , tranquilizer amphetamine . System condition affect connective tissue sensorymotor coordination . Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
